description:
Twin Phantom goes back to St. Cherine to steal the last of the Seven Amulets, but Dark Trader, believing in overkill, also sends in an army of preprogrammed mechas. Will Twin Angel be able to save their school let alone the powerful artifacts?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikkikasei! Yami ni Moeru Bara Ichi-rin
In One Stroke! One Rose Burning in the Darkness!
一気呵成! 闇に燃えるバラ一輪
